title: of State at the Department of Culture, Communications and Sport) Order 2025.
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser (Minister
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser (Minister 
of State at the Department of Culture, Communications and Sport) Order 2025.
text_norm: 1 order may cited appointment special adviser (minister state department culture communication sport) order 2025

title: of State at the Department of Culture, Communications and Sport) Order 2025.
heading: 2. Ciaran O’Donnell, particulars of whose address have been deposited at
text_raw:
2. Ciaran O’Donnell, particulars of whose address have been deposited at 
the offices of the Department of Culture, Communications and Sport, is 
appointed as Special Adviser to Charlie McConalogue, Minister of State at the 
Department of Culture, Communications and Sport with effect from 19th 
February 2025. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

1 July, 2025. 

SIMON HARRIS, 

Tánaiste. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 8th July, 2025. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [357] 3
